ROM.Changelog:
### Changelog 20170807 * audio driver from stock (fix sound in voip application) * sec_config update * kernel update
### Changelog 20170826 * ROM update to 11.7 version
### Changelog 20170916 * Kenel BS 3.5.i * Last CVE: Sep 5 (include BlueBorne)
### Changelog 20170929 * Camera now write 4k video * Google Camera now work * Vendor tree was fully remaked from beginning (from 23S and OB20) * Switched to new radio stack * Added dynamic boosting support via QPerformance * Patched BlueBorne kernel vulnerability * Fix sdcardfs for multirom (it will work without patches in secondary rom with sdcardfs) * Some power tweek * Kernel BS-3.5.i-RR-PS * Miscellaneous audio fixes and tuning
### Changelog 20171001 * Fix VoLTE issue from prev. build * Fix autobrightnes values * Fix audio * Dex preopted * ViperFX was removed from build * Omni SnapdragonCamera was replaced to default
### Changelog 20171004 * VoLTE fix [?] need test (thanks moto999999) * Loud notification fix * Security patch 05 Oct * Autofocus fix (thanks infrag)
### Changelog 20171006 * Blobs downgraded from 23S to 19S, its more stable, camera has no "white dots". * Slowmotion fix * Removed unneeded shim for ims, it cause camera "clicks" * VoLTE must work now * Autobrightnes tweek * Improved battery
